name: From Me To You
description:
It's 5 PM, and you feel stuck. 

You made a promise to go to your crush's birthday party. Just a small celebration with a few friends, friendly and intimate. It's in her favorite cafe near the campus, and it starts in just a few hours.

But then, you haven't bought her a present yet.

Not to worry though, your friend and hers are there to help!

Call them and check their opinions, and maybe, just maybe, you can find a good present for her <3
